content.gatha1: ‘‘Phalaṃ mūlañca paṇṇañca, na bhuñjāmi ahaṃ tadā;
content.gathalast: Muyhase mohanīye ca, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
Mā kho visuddhaṃ dūsesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
Ubhopi mā virādhesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
Neva gāme araññe vā, na hi taṃ kaṭṭhasammataṃ.
Ubhato muttako ajja, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Siyā nu kho tava etaṃ, ko pajānāti te idaṃ;
content.gathalast: Saddhādhuraṃ vahisisaddhādhuraṃ jahasisīghaṃ dhuraṃ vahisi me, kosajjabahulāya ca.
Saṃvāsaṃ alabhanto hi, kathaṃ jīvihisijīvissasi tuvaṃ.
Balī nāgo upagantvā, yūthā nīharate gajaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yūthā vinissaṭo santo, sukhaṃ sātaṃ na vindati;
content.gathalast: Tehi tvaṃ nissaṭo santo, sukhaṃ sātaṃ na lacchasi.
Tathā sīlavihīno tvaṃ, na jhāyissasi yārissati (syā.) katthaci.
Mattikaṃ pettikañcāpi, natthi te nihitaṃ dhanaṃ.
Evaṃ jīvihisi gehe, sādhu te taṃ na ruccati.
Lāsito abhīto (syā.) byaggharājāva, ākāse caṅkamī tadā.
Maṇi yathā jotiraso, ākāse caṅkamī tadā.
‘Devo nu kho ayaṃ satto, udāhu manujo ayaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, mahiyā ediso naro;
content.gathalast: Api mantapadaṃ atthi, ayaṃ satthā bhavissati’.
Bhoge te ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṃ.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Subhūti nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā subhūti thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Devā sattahi ratnehi sattaratanehi (sī.), aññaṃ vaḍḍhesu yojanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Manussā ceva devā ca, buddhathūpaṃ akaṃsu te.
Manussā devā nāgā ca, buddhathūpaṃ akaṃsu te.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbaṃ maṇimayaṃ thūpaṃ, akaruṃ te ca kañcukaṃsabbamaṇimayaṃ thūpe, akaruttarakañcukaṃ ;
content.gatha2: Manussā ceva devā ca, nāgā ca garuḷā tathā.
content.gathalast: Manussā devā nāgā ca, garuḷā kumbhaaṇḍakā.
Cha yojanāni ubbiddho, thūpo obhāsate tadā.
Rattindivā na ñāyanti, āloko hotiālokā hontiālokā honti sabbadā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tena kālena ye keci, thūpaṃ pūjenti mānusā;
content.gathalast: Na te thūpamāruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te.
Dhajaṃ vā pupphadāmaṃ vā, abhiropeti uttari.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na te passanti taṃ yakkhaṃ, dāmaṃ passanti gacchato;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ passitvā gacchantā, sabbe gacchanti suggatiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Viruddhāvisaddhā ye pāvacane, pasannā ye ca sāsane;
‘‘Nagare haṃsavatiyā, ahosiṃ bhatako varako (syā. ka.) tadā;
content.gathalast: Āmoditaṃ janaṃ disvā, evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā.
Imā ca janatā tuṭṭhā, kāraṃ kubbaṃ na tappare kubbantanappakaṃ (sī.).
Vāteritaṃ dhajaṃ disvā, bhiyyo hāsaṃ janesahaṃ.
Taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā, vipākaṃ pucchahaṃ dhaje.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
content.gathalast: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā upavāno thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Andhā mātā pitā mayhaṃ, te posemi ahaṃ tadā.
Etādise bhavebhaye jāte, natthi koci vināyako.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Buddho loke samuppanno, dippatidibbati jinasāsanaṃ (sī.) dāni sāsanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ desaṃyaṃ yaṃ desaṃ upapajjāmiupagacchāmi , aṭṭha hetū labhāmahaṃ.
Mittānaṃ acalo homi, yaso abbhuggato mamaṃ.
So me dhammamadesesi, saraṇañca adāsi me.
Tato me sukataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha.
Anubhotvā yasaṃ sabbaṃ, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ.
Ahaṃatthaṃ vo kathayissāmi, sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ mama.
content.gatha1: ‘‘‘Sammā dhammaṃ bhāvetvānamamopamaṃ karitvānamamopamaṃ karitvāna , sīlāni parigopiya;
content.gathalast: Sāvako te mahāvīra, saraṇo caraṇe (sī. syā.) vandati satthuno’.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā tisaraṇagamaniyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Kena nu kho upāyena, visaṃyutto bhave ahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Deyyadhammo ca me natthi, varāko bhatako ahaṃ;
content.gathalast: Mātā ca me pitā ceva, pañcasikkhāpadaggahuṃ.
Aparimeyye ito kappe, vinipātaṃ na gacchahaṃ.
Bhavesu yadi rajjeyyuṃ, vipāko kīdiso bhave.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pañcasīlasamādāniyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Alatthaṃ paramaṃ pītiṃ, disvā dantaṃ jutindharaṃ.
Mahākāruṇiko loke nātho (sī.), anumodi mamaṃ tadā.
Buddhe cittaṃ pasādetvā, kappaṃ saggamhi modahaṃ.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā annasaṃsāvako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ yaṃ yonupapajjāmi, devattaṃ atha mānusaṃ;
‘‘Catunnavutito kappe, yaṃ dhūpamadadiṃ tadā yaṃ dhūpanamadāsahaṃ (ka.);
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā dhūpadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tiṃsatime tipaññāse (sī. syā.) ito kappe, rājā āsiṃ janādhibhū;
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā pulinapūjako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Upāgate ca upāgatamhi (syā. ka.) sambuddhe, ahampi tatthupāgamiṃ;
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā uttiyouttiriyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā ekañjaliko thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Ekaṃ khomaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, kusalatthāya satthuno.
content.paragraph: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā khomadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
content.gathalast: Annasaṃsāvako khomadāyī ca, daseva tatiye gaṇe;
content.gatha1: Añjalī khomadāyī ca, daseva tatiye gaṇe;
